title: Organic Sea Moss Supplement with Bladderwrack & Burdock Root | Irish Sea Moss Capsules with BioPerine | Thyroid Support, Immune Boost & Mineral Rich Superfood - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Organic Sea Moss - Complete Mineral & Thyroid Support

Harness the power of the ocean with our Organic Sea Moss with Bladderwrack & Burdock Root, a premium triple-blend superfood supplement. This potent combination provides 92+ essential minerals and nutrients to support thyroid function, boost immunity, enhance energy, and promote overall wellness. Enhanced with BioPerine® for maximum absorption.

Key Benefits

  • Thyroid Support: Bladderwrack rich in natural iodine supports healthy thyroid function and metabolism
  • 92+ Essential Minerals: Irish Sea Moss provides nearly all minerals your body needs including iodine, calcium, potassium, and magnesium
  • Immune System Boost: Powerful antioxidants and vitamins strengthen natural defenses
  • Detoxification Support: Burdock Root helps cleanse blood and support liver function
  • Energy & Vitality: Nutrient-dense formula combats fatigue and supports sustained energy
  • Digestive Health: Natural prebiotics support gut health and regularity
  • Skin, Hair & Nails: Collagen-supporting minerals promote beauty from within
  • Enhanced Absorption: BioPerine® increases nutrient bioavailability

Powerful Ocean Superfood Blend

  • Organic Irish Sea Moss (500mg): Contains 92 of 102 minerals the body needs, supports immunity, thyroid, and overall health
  • Organic Bladderwrack (500mg): Rich in iodine for thyroid support, contains fucoidan for immune health
  • Organic Burdock Root (400mg): Traditional detoxifier that supports liver health and blood purification
  • BioPerine® (5mg): Black pepper extract that enhances nutrient absorption by up to 30%

Why This Triple Blend?

The combination of Sea Moss, Bladderwrack, and Burdock Root is a time-honored formula that works synergistically:

  • Sea Moss provides essential minerals and supports immunity
  • Bladderwrack adds thyroid-supporting iodine and metabolism support
  • Burdock Root enhances detoxification and digestive health
  • Together they create a complete wellness formula

Perfect For

  • Thyroid health support
  • Mineral deficiency
  • Low energy and fatigue
  • Immune system support
  • Detoxification
  • Skin, hair, and nail health

Suggested Use: Take 2 capsules daily with meals or as directed by your healthcare provider.

Quality Assurance: 100% Organic ingredients. Vegan pullulan capsules. No fillers or artificial additives.
shortDescriptionHtml: Support thyroid health and immunity with Organic Sea Moss, Bladderwrack & Burdock Root. Triple-blend superfood provides 92+ essential minerals, energy support, and detoxification. Enhanced with BioPerine® for absorption. 60 capsules.
supplementFacts:
Supplement Facts
Serving Size: 2 Capsules
Servings Per Container: 30

Amount Per Serving / %DV
Organic Irish Moss (Chondrus crispus) (whole plant) 500 mg **
Organic Bladderwrack (Fucus vesiculosus) (whole plant) 500 mg **
Organic Burdock (Arctium lappa) (root) 400 mg **
BioPerine® (Black Pepper Extract) (Piper nigrum) (fruit) 5 mg **

** Daily Value (DV) not established

Other Ingredients: Pullulan Capsules.
Distributed by: successchemistry.com
